steps.name: Log in to the app as standard_user
Get the product by it's name: Sauce Labs Backpack
$(".inventory_item_name.findBy(text "Sauce Labs Backpack")/By.xpath: ancestor::*[contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' inventory_item ')][1]/button") should(exist)
$(".inventory_item_name.findBy(text "Sauce Labs Backpack")/By.xpath: ancestor::*[contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' inventory_item ')][1]/button") should be(visible)
$(".inventory_item_name.findBy(text "Sauce Labs Backpack")/By.xpath: ancestor::*[contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' inventory_item ')][1]/button") should be(interactable)
$(".inventory_item_name.findBy(text "Sauce Labs Backpack")/By.xpath: ancestor::*[contains(concat(' ', normalize-space(@class), ' '), ' inventory_item ')][1]/button") click()
